list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a thin, pointed piece of metal, wood, or another rigid material.
a sharp increase in the magnitude or concentration of something.
a flower cluster formed of many flower heads attached directly to a long stem.
impale on or pierce with a sharp point.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô ấy đã tăng vọt một con hàu khác

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: form into or cover with sharp points.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: his hair was matted and spiked with blood
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tóc anh ta mờ và mọc lên bằng máu

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: add alcohol or a drug to contaminate (drink or food) surreptitiously.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she bought me an orange juice and spiked it with vodka
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô ấy đã mua cho tôi một nước cam và tăng vệt với vodka

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (in volleyball) hit (the ball) forcefully from a position near the net so that it moves downward into the opposite court.
